level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-117, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 16-4301.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-85, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 16-4301.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Repeal of Uniform Arbitration Act: D.C. Law 17-111, § 3, Feb. 27, 2008, 55 DCR 1847, provides: "Effective July 1, 2009, Chapter 43 of Title 16 of the District of Columbia Official Code is repealed."

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 10 of the Uniform Arbitration Act. See Volume 7, Part I Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
